div.p:
The δ 18O records from ostracode shells of Bicornucythere bisanensis. The data from the N2015 core (blue) were represented by adding the records from the X core (green)
19 . The coloured thick, thin and extra-thin lines suggest 500 yr and 50 yr running mean values and measurement values, respectively. Environmental changes were derived from fossil ostracode assemblages
18 .
